abilities.name: Warmaster
abilities.rule: In your Command phase, select one Warmaster ability. Until the start of your next Command phase, this model has that ability.

abilities.name: Dark Destiny
abilities.rule: Each time this model’s unit makes a Dark Pact and does not fail the resulting Leadership test, if the result of that test was 7+, you gain 1CP.

custom_rules.title: Warmaster
custom_rules.text:
Paragon of Hatred (Aura)
While a friendly **HERETIC ASTARTES** unit (excluding **DAMNED** units) is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
Mark of Chaos Ascendant (Aura)
While a friendly **HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY** or **HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED** unit (excluding **DAMNED** units) is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.
Lord of the Traitor Legions (Aura)
While a friendly **HERETIC ASTARTES** unit (excluding **DAMNED** units) is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Leadership and Battle-shock tests taken for that unit.
